metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5853 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Integer overflow in base/PdfParser.cpp in PoDoFo 0.9.4 allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via a crafted file. Agostino Sarubbo discovered that PoDoFo mishandled certain crafted PDF files, an integer overflow. If PoDoFo were to open a malicious PDF, an attacker could cause PoDoFo to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: libpodofo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
